title: Is the solo/duo ranked system broken at the moment?

embed.description: Twiggymocha / Silver 2 16LP / 361W 361L Win Ratio 50% / Sion - 205W 165L Win Ratio 55%, Irelia - 71W 53L Win Ratio 57%, Twisted Fate - 48W 38L Win Ratio 56%, Nasus - 47W 37L Win Ratio 56%, Draven - 38W 42L Win Ratio 48%

body:
My lp gains and losses are not consistent and I often lose more than I gain. My previous game I won and only got 16lp, but my mmr according to op.gg is higher than my current rank, and also according to op.gg the game mmr was also higher than my current mmr. And I carried that game, I did not perform badly.

I linked my op.gg if you want to check for yourself.

replies.body: ranked is fine. op.gg is just wrong

ranked is kinda fucked accounting for preseason.
dw bout it.
